se.kth.akok.index.geometries.polygon

Class BasicPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.kth.akok.index.geometries.polygon.BasicPolygon

  • public class BasicPolygon
extends Object
    Represents a polygon. Holds information about its points, and the visible area around this polygon.
    Author:
    Andreas Kokkalis

      • pointInPolygon

        public boolean pointInPolygon(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate coordinate)
        Checks whether a point is equal to a known point of the polygon, or within minimum distance of a known polygon point.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - The coordinate of the point to check.
        Returns:
        True if the point is part of the polygon.

      • incomingPointExists

        public boolean incomingPointExists(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate coordinate,
                          com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineSegment ray)
        Checks whether an incoming point is already stored for this polygon.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - The coordinate of the incoming point.
        ray - The incoming ray.
        Returns:
        Returns true, if the incoming point already exists and the incoming ray already exist.
